void calc(int a[],int size){
	int max[size] ;
	int savea[size];
	max[size-1]=0;
	
	for(int i=0;i<size;i++){
	//	cout<<a[i]<<" ";
		savea[i]=a[i];
	}
//	cout<<endl;

	for(int i=size-2;i>=0;i--)
	{
		max[i] = ( a[i+1] > max[i+1] ) ? a[i+1] : max[i+1];
	}
/*
	for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
		cout<<max[i]<<" ";
	cout<<endl;

*/
	for(int i=0;i<size;){
		int	newVal= ( max[i] < a[i] ) ? max[i] : a[i];
		i++;
		while(newVal > a[i] && i < size){
			a[i]=newVal;
			i++;
		}
	}

	
/*	for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
	cout<<endl;
*/
	int water=0
		;
	for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
		water += a[i] - savea[i];
	cout<<water<<endl;
}
